Title: Term of Trial
Actors: Laurence Olivier, Simone Signoret, Sarah Miles, Terence Stamp
Plot: In Britain, a high-school girl becomes infatuated with her English teacher but, after he rejects her amorous advances, she goes to the police and accuses him of indecent assault.
Awards: Nominated for 2 BAFTA Film Awards. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
